title: Lisia?/Silia? (island)
description: Lisia?/Silia? Ins. is the island of Guernsey which shows evidence for prehistoric habitation. During the Roman period there is evidence of both settlement and trading activity.

properties.description: coordinates after GeoHack, verified in Google Earth 2013.
properties.title: location of Lisia?/Silia? Ins.
